name: Cosmic Cookoff: Mathematics
description:
Front of Sleeve - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

In Cosmic Cookoff, your child will practice his or her mathematics test-taking skills as Mars and Cali navigate through the solar system, racing againts Flinch and Wigsley in search of the perfect recipe.

LEARNING OBJECTIVES
  • Understand and identify place values
  • Create the greatest sum and difference
  • Compare and order whole numbers
  • Compare and order fractions and decimals
  • Read and interpret bar graphs
  • Plot points on a coordinate plane
  • Practice test-taking skills
